infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Ursine Arcana uses your location to show you nearby users.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Ursine Arcana uses your location to show you nearby users even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Ursine Arcana needs access to your photos to let you upload profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Ursine Arcana needs access to your camera to let you take profile pictures.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Ursine Arcana to use your location to show nearby users.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Ursine Arcana to access your photos for profile pictures.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Ursine Arcana to access your camera for profile pictures.
